data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 75,384 believers in Puntarenas, Costa Rica a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Puntarenas, Costa Rica
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 75,384 believers in the state of Puntarenas.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 317,593 people in the state of Puntarenas who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 410,900 citizens of Puntarenas, Costa Rica, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Puntarenas, Costa Rica.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 75,384 believers in the state of Puntarenas to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Puntarenas.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Puntarenas
